Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local Northbound  Reroute near Jeffery/91st
ShortDescription: Northbound J14 Jeffery Jump & 15 Jeffery Local buses are temp rerouted via Jeffery, 93rd, Stony Island, and 87th due to, street blockage near Jeffery/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 93rd, Stony Island, and 87th: due to, street blockage near Jeffery/91st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
